name: Kawasaki Superbike Challenge
overview: Get ready for the biggest adrenaline rush of your life - Kawasaki SuperBike Challenge! Straddle real, high-powered Kawasaki motorcycles, then bury the throttle, lay low on the seat and scream. This game provides superior graphics, sound, speed and handling. Choose from 15 circuits, including the Suzuka 8-hour Endurance Race. Experience realistic motorcycle racing with weather changes which affect performance and tire wear. Kawasaki SuperBike Challenge is motorcycle racing at its fastest!
